DOC.brief_title: Influence Intra Canal Medications Postoperative Flare-up Endodontic Re-treatment Cases
DOC.detailed_description: Problem : patient need retreatment Intervention : calcium hydroxide chlorhexidine combination intra-canal medicament Control : calcium hydroxide alone intra-canal medicament Outcome : postoperative flare-up ( pain swell ) Time : 7 day 1st visit . population examine : 1 . Patients ' need retreatment . 2 . Patients good health systemic disease ( American Society Anesthesiologists Class II ) 3 . Age range 20 50 year . 4 . Patients understand categorical tool ( point ) measurement 5 . Patients able sign inform consent .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients ' need retreatment . 2 . Patients good health systemic disease ( American Society Anesthesiologists Class II ) 3 . Age range 20 50 year . 4 . Patients understand categorical tool ( point ) measurement 5 . Patients able sign inform consent . 1 ) Complicating systemic disease 2 ) Having severe pain and/or acute apical abscess 3 ) Being 18 year age 4 ) Using antibiotic corticosteroid , 5 ) multiple teeth require retreatment eliminate possibility pain referral 6 ) Having root canal could treat well initial root canal treatment .
